entities.name: seamus finnigan
entities.description: Seamus Finnigan is a fellow Gryffindor fourth year student. He is sitting in front of his own shamrock-covered tent with his mother and best friend Dean Thomas.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students who heard their names being called by Seamus Finnigan. He is a Gryffindor fourth year student.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the students who heard their names being called by Seamus Finnigan. He is a Gryffindor fourth year student.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the students who heard their names being called by Seamus Finnigan. She is a Gryffindor fourth year student.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas is Seamus Finnigan's best friend and a fellow Gryffindor fourth year student.

entities.name: mrs. finnigan
entities.description: Mrs. Finnigan is Seamus Finnigan's mother. She is sitting in front of her son's shamrock-covered tent.

relationships.description: Seamus Finnigan called out to Harry, Ron, and Hermione.
